verses.verse: וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> And I said שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָא֙ <WH4994> now רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> I pray you O heads יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וּקְצִינֵ֖י <WH7101> and ye princes בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> not לָכֶ֔ם לָדַ֖עַת <WH3045> [Is it] not for you to know אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> adversary

שֹׂ֥נְאֵי <WH8130> Who hate ט֖וֹב <WH2896> the good וְאֹ֣הֲבֵי <WH157> and love [רָעָה כ] (רָ֑ע <WH7451> adversity ק) גֹּזְלֵ֤י <WH1497> who pluck off עוֹרָם֙ <WH5785> their skin מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and וּשְׁאֵרָ֖ם <WH7607> from off them and their flesh מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from עַצְמוֹתָֽם׃ <WH6106> from off their bones

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Who אָכְלוּ֮ <WH398> Who also eat שְׁאֵ֣ר <WH7607> the flesh עַמִּי֒ <WH5971> of my people וְעוֹרָם֙ <WH5785> their skin מֵעֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> and הִפְשִׁ֔יטוּ <WH6584> and flay וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַצְמֹֽתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6106> their bones פִּצֵּ֑חוּ <WH6476> from off them and they break וּפָרְשׂוּ֙ <WH6566> and chop them in pieces כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Who בַּסִּ֔יר <WH5518> as for the pot וּכְבָשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> and as flesh בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> within קַלָּֽחַת׃ <WH7037> the caldron

אָ֚ז <WH227> Then יִזְעֲק֣וּ <WH2199> Then shall they cry אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> He will not יַעֲנֶ֖ה <WH6030> but he will not hear אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וְיַסְתֵּ֨ר <WH5641> them he will even hide פָּנָ֤יו <WH6440> his face מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> that בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> from them at that time הַהִ֔יא <WH1931> he כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Because הֵרֵ֖עוּ <WH7489> as they have behaved themselves ill מַעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> in their doings פ

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <WH5030> concerning the prophets הַמַּתְעִ֣ים <WH8582> err אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> that make my people הַנֹּשְׁכִ֤ים <WH5391> that bite בְּשִׁנֵּיהֶם֙ <WH8127> with their teeth וְקָרְא֣וּ <WH7121> and cry שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> Peace וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> nothing יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and he that putteth עַל־ <WH5921> against פִּיהֶ֔ם <WH6310> not into their mouths וְקִדְּשׁ֥וּ <WH6942> they even prepare עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> concerning מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> war

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore לַ֤יְלָה <WH3915> Therefore night לָכֶם֙ מֵֽחָז֔וֹן <WH2377> [shall be] unto you that ye shall not have a vision וְחָשְׁכָ֥ה <WH2821> be black לָכֶ֖ם מִקְּסֹ֑ם <WH7080> unto you that ye shall not divine וּבָ֤אָה <WH935> shall go down הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> and the sun עַל־ <WH5921> over הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> over the prophets וְקָדַ֥ר <WH6937> shall be dark עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> over הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> and the day

וּבֹ֣שׁוּ <WH954> be ashamed הַחֹזִ֗ים <WH2374> Then shall the seers וְחָֽפְרוּ֙ <WH2659> confounded הַקֹּ֣סְמִ֔ים <WH7080> and the diviners וְעָט֥וּ <WH5844> yea they shall all cover עַל־ <WH5921> and שָׂפָ֖ם <WH8222> their lips כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> will all כִּ֛י <WH3588> Because אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מַעֲנֵ֖ה <WH4617> for [there is] no answer אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וְאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> But truly אָנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I מָלֵ֤אתִי <WH4390> I am full כֹ֙חַ֙ <WH3581> of power אֶת־ <WH853> ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> by the spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> and of judgment וּגְבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> and of might לְהַגִּ֤יד <WH5046> to declare לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> unto Jacob פִּשְׁע֔וֹ <WH6588> his transgression וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and to Israel חַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <WH2403> his sin ס

שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Hear נָ֣א <WH4994> Now זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise רָאשֵׁי֙ <WH7218> this I pray you ye heads בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וּקְצִינֵ֖י <WH7101> and princes בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel הַֽמֲתַעֲבִ֣ים <WH8581> that abhor מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> judgment וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> everything הַיְשָׁרָ֖ה <WH3477> all equity יְעַקֵּֽשׁוּ׃ <WH6140> and pervert
בֹּנֶ֥ה <WH1129> They build up צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> Zion בְּדָמִ֑ים <WH1818> with blood וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem בְּעַוְלָֽה׃ <WH5766> with iniquity

רָאשֶׁ֣יהָ ׀ <WH7218> The heads בְּשֹׁ֣חַד <WH7810> for reward יִשְׁפֹּ֗טוּ <WH8199> thereof judge וְכֹהֲנֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3548> and the priests בִּמְחִ֣יר <WH4242> for hire יוֹר֔וּ <WH3384> thereof teach וּנְבִיאֶ֖יהָ <WH5030> and the prophets בְּכֶ֣סֶף <WH3701> for money יִקְסֹ֑מוּ <WH7080> thereof divine וְעַל־ <WH5921> on יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> upon the LORD יִשָּׁעֵ֣נוּ <WH8172> yet will they lean לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> and say הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> is not יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [Is] not the LORD בְּקִרְבֵּ֔נוּ <WH7130> among לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not תָב֥וֹא <WH935> can come עָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> and רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> us? none evil

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> Therefore בִּגְלַלְכֶ֔ם <WH1558> for your sake צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> Therefore shall Zion שָׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> [as] a field תֵֽחָרֵ֑שׁ <WH2790> be plowed וִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> and Jerusalem עִיִּ֣ין <WH5856> shall become heaps תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will become וְהַ֥ר <WH2022> and the mountain הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house לְבָמ֥וֹת <WH1116> as the high places יָֽעַר׃ <WH3293> of the forest פ
